replies.body:
Just to clarify, you can earn keys fragments by winning matchmade games.  Once you get 3 fragments, you can create a full key!  Alternatively, if you really want to know what's in the box, you can buy completed keys for RP as well in the store.

If you had a more specific question about how this works, let me know!

One question! On my main account in LAN, I "won" 4 key fragment, but those were in OFA, and I write it as "won" because I got the message :
"You must own the champion to earn  hextech chest / key fragments" something like that. 
Rioters in LAN said that fragments drops by cycle (There is one point you earn a lot then you barely get any)

Now my question is,  . Did I just lost my chances to get key fragments this month since I didn't have the champs when they were supposed to drop? 
Hope you can give me an answer, thanks!.

Currently there is a bug where you will not earn the Key Fragment if you don't own the champion.  This is something we are looking to get fixed in the near future.  This shouldn't take up a key fragment "slot" though since it was never in your inventory.
Thanks! I was kinda worried about it, since then I just had no luck .

Is there a hard cap to the number of key fragments you can get per month?

I know the odds diminish with eahc subsequent key fragment, but I don't know if it goes to zero eventually.
I don't believe there is a hard cap.  Just the odds of you earning a new one drop dramatically after every fragment you earn for a specific period of time.

> [{quoted}](name=dArtagnan,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=OjluThYk,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2016-05-13T03:08:20.020+0000)
>
> I don't believe there is a hard cap.  Just the odds of you earning a new one drop dramatically after every fragment you earn for a specific period of time.

Different Rioter already admitted there's a hard cap.

In practice it also seems you can only get 12 per month (unless this changed) which equates to 4 keys.

I was gonna say...

Yea, one chest per week and 12 key fragments a month is a thing, but where you can unlock a new chest every week, the key fragment drop rate resets once a month. The system is designed towards giving you far more chests than keys.

Sorry, but, not really. You can only get as many chests as how many champs you own and play. So let's say you have a champion pool of thirty champions, which is quite high. And assume that in one season you get an S on all of them. That would mean 30 chests in a year. 
Now, 4x12 is 48 keys a year. This is the absolute maximum for keys, but it's not rare to get two keys a month, which would equate 24 keys. 
I'm pretty sure I won't get an S on 24 champions that I own this  year. So while certain people who own a lot of champs and play a different one every game might have more chests than keys by the end of the year, I think most people will end up with more keys.

Except if you play with premades I guess, but I'm talking about solo players here.

There is around 140 champions and you are assuming people play on accounts with less than 40 owned at any given time?

Plus chests are calculated based on whether you own the champion at the time. You only need to have bought the champion before the match in order to be eligible, not at the start of the season. 

Plus if you are in a premade with someone that got the S+ you get the chest (if eligible) regardless of your performance (if you own the champ and did not unlock the chest prior.)

I definitely stand corrected then!  I'll make sure to sync with that team and get our Knowledge Base updated with that knowledge.

Thanks!

does this confirm you can't match chest drop rate with keyfrag drop rate, leading to being unable to reach the "0 chest to open" if you unlock them in the 6 days but don't want to spend rp for key?
The new crafting system was designed as a new revenue stream for Riot.  You are supposed to have more chests than keys.  It encourages you to buy keys for RP, generating income for Riot.

I think the key/chest balance is pretty good. I mean, sure, when Hextech came out we got lots of chests, but as you can only get one per champ, you'll eventually run out. (Realistically most people will only get an S wtih 20 or so champs, and they have to play quite a lot). But the key frag winrate stays even throughout the year. By the end of the season, I'm guessing some people will be complaining they have keys but no chest.
